title: ARM & HAMMER SLIDE Platinum Multi-Cat Easy Clean-Up Clumping Cat Litter, 14 Days of Odor Control 18 lb
description: ARM & HAMMER Slide Platinum clumping cat litter is our most advanced ARM & HAMMER cat litter with patented EZ Clean technology to give you a nonstick, clumping cat litter odor-control product that is perfect for single- and multiple-cat households. Our Platinum formula has 10% more odor eliminator than our ARM & HAMMER Slide Non-Stop Odor-Control Cat Litter, and those powerful odor eliminators combine with ARM & HAMMER baking soda to destroy odors on contact. Plus, the Clump & Seal technology forms an odor-containing seal around urine and feces, so odors are caught and contained before they can leave the litter box. When it comes time to clean the litter box, this clumping litter forms rock-hard clumps and slides right out of the pan, so cleaning up after your cat (or cats) is no problem at all. For over 165 years, people have trusted the ARM & HAMMER brand for a range of versatile, effective household products. In 1992, they introduced their signature cat litter, made with odor-absorbing baking soda, to give pet parents an effective solution for litter box odor.
